meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2787.

td.p: Holly Buchanan, a consultant from Silver Spring, Maryland
Carl Eeman, a pastor from St. Louis Park, Minnesota
Kathy Robbins, a bed-and-breakfast owner from Denver, Colorado (whose 3-day cash winnings total $35,900)

tr.td: LEGISLATURES
FOOD
WORD ORIGINS
THE BODY HUMAN
ANNUAL EVENTS
COMEDIES

China

')
